SELECT [s].[SessionID], [s].[SessionName], COALESCE([s].[Description], N'') AS [Description], [s].[CategoryID], COALESCE([s].[IsActive], CAST(0 AS bit)) AS [IsActive]
FROM [dbo].[Sessions] AS [s]
